title: Delete a component palette
content:
When you delete a palette, all of its component types (including all component properties, constraints, and templates) are deleted. The deletion can take a few minutes depending on the number of component types in the palette. Deletion of the component palette can't be undone.

You can't delete a component palette in the following cases:

  • If the palette is locked, as designated by the Lock icon.
  • If any component type contained in the palette is being used in a service design.
  • If any other component palette depends on the palette. That is, if another palette contains a component type that's based on a component type from the palette.

To delete a component palette

  1. Click the gear icon and select Manage Component Palettes.

  2. In the Component Palettes dialog, select a component you want to delete.
  3. Click the Delete Selected Component Palette icon.
  4. Click Yes in the confirmation dialog.
  5. Click Done.
